sentence.Network_en: Applied feasibility and effect of puccinia corticioides pigment in food were studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了竹蓐色素在食品中应用的可能性及其使用效果.

sentence.Network_en: Its most devastating form ( Puccinia graminis ) attacks the plant's stem, forming lethal, scaly red pustules.
sentence.Network_cn: 其最为严重的破坏方式 ( 小麦锈菌 ) 是袭击植物的茎, 形成导致植株死亡的鳞片状红色脓疱.

sentence.Network_en: This study supplies scientific basis for exploiting and applying of puccinia corticioides pigment.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究结果为竹蓐色素的开发利用提供了科学依据.

means.word_mean: 1. type genus of the Pucciniaceae; a large genus of parasitic fungi including many that are destructive to various economic plants
